K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:454b-0: @454b zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe chos grub gyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:454b-1: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:454b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:454b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-0: bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs @455a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-1: mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-4: bdag la padma du ma chen po'i tshandan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-5: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-6: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-10: gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455a-11: yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i @455b phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhugs pas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-1: khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-2: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar bkas gnang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-3: langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas slar stan la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-4: sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan po'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-6: na mo a'arya ba lo ke te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-9: ma h'a k'a ru ti k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-11: aom tsa kra pa ti tsinta ma ni ma h'a padme ru ru ti shtha te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-13: a'a k'a r'a ye h'um sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-18: dza la ma h'a badzra bha ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-21: aom bha ra ta padme h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-23: snying gi snying po'i sngags lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-24: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-25: sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:455b-33: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g-yos par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-1: bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-2: bdud kyi rgyal po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-4: 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngangs shing skrag pas gdong bkab ste sa la 'gyel bar gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-5: sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams rnam par thar te lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-6: de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-7: rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-8: lha'i rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-0: @456b de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-2: sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-11: bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis 'di tshe nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-12: gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di mi bskyud par bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-14: dus mi 'dam par gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-15: rtag par kha don du bzlas par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-16: bgyi ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-17: ci yang rung ste don du bgyi zhing gnyer pa zhig mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-18: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:456b-19: rig sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang sgrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-3: da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-4: sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-5: gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-6: mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-7: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-10: bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-11: gang dag rims nad nyin gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-18: bad kan la sogs pas bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-19: thams cad 'byang zhing sos par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457a-20: gang zhig dug dang byad stems kyis phog par gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-9: lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos par bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-10: ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-15: 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-22: ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-25: rgyal po ma rungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-26: rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-27: glo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-28: rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-34: gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-37: spyang ki dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:457b-38: g-yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-1: dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-3: gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-4: gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-5: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-6: rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-7: ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-8: thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du ston par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-10: mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-12: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-13: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri po ta la yang mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458a-14: bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-0: bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs @458b su dag par 'gyur bas rtag par rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-1: blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-2: skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-3: skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing padma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-4: bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-5: skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur; 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te; 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-6: sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-7: sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-9: thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-10: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-13: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:458b-14: de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-0: @459a *// dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-3: ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-4: lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-5: skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-6: sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-7: byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-8: 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs rtag pa gang lags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-9: gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-10: gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-11: gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-12: sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-13: gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-14: rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-15: nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-16: yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459a-17: gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-13: mu stegs sna tshogs dag la sten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-14: de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grangs tshang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-15: gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer zhing rgyal po la bsten par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-16: dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-17: gal te btsun mo la bsten par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-18: lan dgu brgya bzlas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-19: rgyal bu la bsten par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-20: lan brgyad brgya bzlas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-22: lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-23: rgyal po'i bu mo la bsten par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-24: lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-25: bram ze la bsten par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-26: lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-27: rgyal rigs la bsten par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-28: lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:459b-33: dge slong dang dge slong ma la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-1: dang dge bsnyen ma la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-3: khye'u gzhon nu dang bu mo gzhon du ma la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-6: bsten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-10: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor bar bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-11: gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' ba dag ring po na mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-12: yid la bsam pa bzhin du rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-13: ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi bar grangs tshang bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-14: don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-15: gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-16: lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-17: gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-18: bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyis smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460a-20: 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-0: lan khri @460b sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-1: gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-2: rig sngags 'chad rnams mngon sum du ston cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-3: so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsal nas yongs su srung bar bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-6: brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas de'i smon pa rnams stsol ba bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-7: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-8: smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-9: 'di ni; byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-10: thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so; ;byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:460b-11: thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-0: /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang gis mthong @461a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-1: bdag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid shin tu 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-12: gser gyi gyim pag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos sbrus te snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdug gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-15: dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-22: bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-23: lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lus kyi zho sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-24: nor rdzas dag phangs pa ma mchis par gtor rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-25: brjod kyis mi lang lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461a-26: ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cang 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-0: gang la la zhig sman @461b 'di thogs par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-1: kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-2: rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-5: mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-7: 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-8: bsam pa thag pa nas sman aa ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-9: thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-10: sman 'dis bdugs pas bab chol du g-yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-12: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-13: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:461b-14: gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman aa ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-0: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan @462a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-3: gur gum zhib mor btags te gi'u wa nga dang bsres na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-4: gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnams pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab gtsang mas sbyar nas ril bu che chung shing mgo stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-5: yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-7: rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas ril bu re re la yang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-8: ril bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-10: skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-11: bkur sti bgyis nas nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-12: rin po che dag 'phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-13: tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-14: bsgo ba zhig mchis na yang thams cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-15: khar sman mur ba'i che rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462a-16: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-0: byang chub sems @462b dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba zhig bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor ba bkram zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-2: tsandan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-4: bla re dkar po bris te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du padma dkar po bzhi yang bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-5: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-6: snying gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-7: lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsanan dkar po bsregs te mo tog gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-8: de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-9: dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-10: phyogs gang du mchi yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-11: ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-12: tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:462b-13: don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-4: yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-5: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-6: sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i stan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-8: sman shi ri ka ku shu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-11: rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-12: nya rkun ma nag po'i rus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-20: bca' sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas zhib mor btsags te sman snga ma srang gcig mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463a-22: ga pur srang phyed stsal nas zhib tu bdar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-0: snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad @463b bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-1: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-2: snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-3: de'i rjes la reg par bgyis nas khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-6: ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-11: klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-12: rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-13: mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-15: lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-17: smyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags so; ;gdugs bzhi stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-18: phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-20: dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:463b-25: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-0: @464a *// byad stems thams cad rnam par 'joms shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-1: ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-5: skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-6: zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-7: rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-8: zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-10: blon po chen po dag mdza' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-11: zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-12: gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-13: zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-17: srin po rnams g-yog bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-18: zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-20: srin po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongs su srung bar bgyid pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-22: 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464a-23: zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-0: @464b lha nag po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-1: 'dre srin brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes su 'brang zhing g-yog bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-2: zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-4: zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-5: gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-6: zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-7: lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-8: de na ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-9: 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-10: zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-11: sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-13: mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-14: zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-15: drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-16: nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-17: zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-18: klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-19: lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:464b-20: zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-0: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med @465a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-1: khang dag sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-2: zhag bdun phrag bco lnga'i bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-3: mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du yang bdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-4: zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-5: sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-6: rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-7: zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-8: gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-9: de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-10: zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad kyi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-11: gang dag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-12: zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-13: lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag par nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-14: zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465a-15: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-0: zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig @465b gi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-1: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-2: gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-6: lo gcig gi bar du stsal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-7: yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-8: gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal pa gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-9: sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-11: gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-12: gal te the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-13: cho ga rnams 'grub par dka' ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-15: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tsandan nor bu'i 'khor lo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-16: mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-17: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo'i las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:465b-18: mig sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-0: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan @466a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-1: yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa nyon mongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-2: kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-3: las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-5: bi n'a ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-6: byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-7: sbyin sreg hom bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-8: dogs brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa zhig bgyis nas me tog man len tsa su dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-12: chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-14: shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-15: zheng du sor gcig mchis pa gtubs te thab tu bsreg par bgyi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-16: sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan gcig sngags btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-17: zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-18: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-19: tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466a-20: zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par hom gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-0: tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par @466b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-1: zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-4: blon po chen po nye phan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-5: skye bo phal ba rnams kyang skyabs su mchos nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-6: zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-7: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-9: rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar lhags nas yongs su srung par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-10: lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-11: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-12: gal te yul khams su char dkon par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-14: chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-16: gal te char ches te me khums na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-17: thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste gnam du gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:466b-19: gal te ser ba ma rung ba babs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-0: rlung drag po glo bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya @467a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-1: rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-3: sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-4: mthu stobs mthu po che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-5: lus 'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-6: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skya ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-9: tsandan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-14: bud med gang la la zhig gis lan gcig 'chang bar bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-15: gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467a-16: yid la bsam pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems @467b dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom 'di yang dag par bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-1: 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-2: bde bar byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-3: gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de kha nas bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-6: ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rjes su bstan nas dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-7: nga'i tshig dag 'gal bar ma byed cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-8: nga yang rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-11: bdag ni; bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-12: rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos grub stsal bar ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:467b-13: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dpang du gyur pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-0: sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs @468a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-2: gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-3: rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-6: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab par bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-7: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-8: 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par blangs te spyod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-9: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-10: sbyin sreg hom gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-11: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468a-12: zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-047:468b-0: lo ts'a ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs @468b ba bandhe chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
